name: API Partner
description: Partner API provides models and resources to interact with Flow to generate shipping labels

fields.name: id
fields.description: Globally unique identifier

fields.name: organization
fields.description: Flow-issued ID of client organization whom partner is generating label on behalf

fields.name: order_number
fields.description: Client organization order number for the shipment

fields.name: package
fields.description: Package that is part of this label request.

fields.name: carrier_tracking_number
fields.description: Carrier-issued or generated tracking number of the first carrier taking hold of the package

fields.name: destination
fields.description: Destination contact information and structured address

fields.name: flow_tracking_number
fields.description: Flow-generated tracking number. 13 digit tracking number that begins with F70.

fields.name: origin
fields.description: Origin contact information and structured address

fields.name: service
fields.description: Carrier service level used for generation and shipment of this label

fields.name: window
fields.description: Estimated date range until delivery

fields.name: zpl
fields.description: Base64 encoded ZPL2-formatted data of the shipping label

fields.name: pdf
fields.description: Pre-signed URL containing PDF copy of the shipping label

fields.name: png
fields.description: Pre-signed URL containing PNG copy of the shipping label

fields.name: commercial_invoice
fields.description: URL containing generated PDF commercial invoice required for international shipments

fields.name: references
fields.description: Other reference information. These will be provided to carriers as references on the generated label.

fields.name: label
fields.description: Contains all the output documents for the shipping label

fields.name: invoice
fields.description: Contains all the output documents for the commercial invoice

fields.name: cost
fields.description: Estimated shipping cost of the shipment.

fields.name: organization
fields.description: Flow-issued ID of client organization whom partner is generating label on behalf

fields.name: destination
fields.description: Destination contact information and structured address

fields.name: order_number
fields.description: Client organization order number for the shipment

fields.name: origin
fields.description: Origin contact information and structured address

fields.name: package
fields.description: Package that is part of this label request.

fields.name: service
fields.description: Desired carrier service level to use for this label. If not provided, this will default to the delivery option that Flow calculated for the order.

fields.name: references
fields.description: Other reference information. These will be provided to carriers as references on the generated label.

models.name: partner_fulfillment
models.description: Used to track and manage the fulfillment of an order.

fields.name: organization
fields.description: Flow-issued ID of client organization on whose behalf a partner is fulfilling

fields.name: key
fields.description: Unique key identifying this fulfillment.

fields.name: number
fields.description: Order number

fields.name: items
fields.description: Items as modeled on an order.

fields.name: center
fields.description: The fulfillment center we expect this order to be fulfilled from.

models.name: partner_fulfillment_cancellation_form
models.description: Changing an order for the purpose of cancelling specific line quantities

fields.name: change_source
fields.description: The original source of this update, regardless of who is submitting it to Flow. This can control which parties are notified of a change.

fields.name: reason
fields.description: Reason for the cancellation.

models.name: partner_fulfillment_complete_cancellation_form
models.description: Changing an order for the purpose of completely cancelling all remaining uncancelled, unshipped lines of an order.

fields.name: change_source
fields.description: The original source of this update, regardless of who is submitting it to Flow. This can control which parties are notified of a change.

fields.name: reason
fields.description: Reason for the cancellation.

models.name: partner_manifest
models.description: Represents closeout of a group of labels that have been transfered to the carrier for shipping

fields.name: id
fields.description: Globally unique identifier

fields.name: organization
fields.description: Flow-issued ID of client organization whom partner is generating label on behalf

fields.name: service
fields.description: Carrier service level used for generation and shipment of this label

fields.name: shipping_labels
fields.description: Labels that are part of this manifest

fields.name: pdf
fields.description: URL where to download generated manifest confirmation or bill of lading, if the service requires one be generated for pickup.

models.name: partner_order_identifier
models.description: Represents alternate numbers with which to identify an order.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Globally unique identifier

fields.name: organization
fields.description: Refers to your organization's account identifier

fields.name: number
fields.description: Client's unique identifier for this object

fields.name: number
fields.description: Client's unique identifier for this object

fields.name: id
fields.description: Globally unique identifier

fields.name: number
fields.description: Client's unique identifier for this object

fields.name: id
fields.description: Globally unique identifier

fields.description: Globally unique identifier

operations.description: Generates a new manifest with all outstanding labels and redirects to a downloadable PDF of carrier-generated manifest or bill of lading (BOL). If no outstanding labels, this will generate a 422 error.

annotations.name: personal_data
annotations.description: Identifies a field that contains Personal Data, as defined by GDPR. By default, any field marked with this annotation will be kept for 1 year and will be purgeable upon request provided there are no incomplete business activities associated with it.

annotations.name: consumer
annotations.description: Identifies a field that contains data about a consumer [as opposed to an employee of Flow, an organization or a partner].
